1.content:
You return home to find a piece of mail on the porch.
Taking it inside you find it to be a handheld device with a charging and transfer cable.
Youplug it in to charge it as you look at the label to find that it's called the "Evolver / Devolver", turning it around in your hands you find a couple of buttons and dials which the instruction manual had typed on it as:

Evolve - Press this button to evolve the person / animal.
Devolve - Press this button to devolve the person / animal.
Year Dial - Turn the dial forwards or backwards to set how much the target d/evolves by.
Group - Press this button to toggle to d/evolve many people at the same time.

You hear a ping as the remote has finished charging you contemplate using it.

But first, who are you?
1.title: The Beginning

info.brief_description: You find a remote that can change evolution. Let the fun begin.
info.description:
You return home to find a piece of mail on the porch.
Taking it inside you find it to be a handheld device with a charging and transfer cable.
You turn it on to find that it's called the "Evolver / Devolver", turning it around in your hands you find a couple of buttons and dials which the instruction manual had typed on it as:

Evolve - Press this button to evolve the person / animal.
Devolve - Press this button to devolve the person / animal.
Year Dial - Turn the dial forwards or backwards to set how much the target d/evolves by.
Group - Press this button to toggle to d/evolve many people at the same time.

Bonus Features - Plug it into a computer and you can download pictures of people to d/evolve
- Save Feature

General Notes: Keep information consistant. Glaring spelling mistakes, grammatical errors, and continuity errors will be edited to keep the story as concise and as cohesive as possible. No M/M Action or scat.
